name: default1

name: shop1

description: Knockback from enemies is less effective.

name: brawlbox1
description: When defeating an enemy, restore some health.

name: brawlbox2
description: Every few seconds, restore some missing health.

name: brawlbox3
description: Once per level when at low health, heal a large amount of health.

name: brawlbox4
description: Attacks deal extra damage every second for a few seconds.

name: brawlbox5
description: When defeating an enemy, increase the next attack's damage.

name: brawlbox6
description: The super charges faster when out of combat.

name: brawlbox7
description: The super charges past a full charge.

name: oldtown
description: After a few seconds at full health, gain a shield.

name: biodome
description: When at full health, deal more damage.

name: ghoststation
description: Gain extra power points for each level completed.

name: deepsea
description: Using the super increases life steal for the rest of the level.

name: giftshop
description: Increases health, damage, and speed.

name: retropolis
description: Damage marks from enemies are less effective.

name: candyland
description: When defeating an enemy, gain speed for a few seconds.

name: rumblejungle

name: stuntshow
description: Increases super reload speed.

name: supercity
description: For the first few seconds of each level, gain speed and damage.

name: arcade
description: Defeating enemies increases damage for the rest of the level.

name: wins
description: Increases attack reload speed.

name: enemies
description: Increases the chance to receive rare drops from brawl box rewards.

name: challenges
description: Gain more mastery points from rewards.

name: nomove
description: When at low health, take less damage.
unlock: Win without moving. Supers are allowed.

name: noupgrades
description: The first gear activation in each level does not consume a gear token.
unlock: Win without purchasing upgrades or using gears.

name: nodamage
description: Increases healing when out of combat.

name: fastwin
description: When defeating an enemy, partially recharge the super.

name: perfect1
description: Increases game score.
unlock: Get a score of 600 on difficulty 6.

name: perfect2
description: Increases the charge rate of Hypercharge.
unlock: Get a score of 600 on difficulty 10.
